title: Why South Africa will win the World Cup: Six reasons the Springboks can go all the way... and the one that might stop them
text:
South Africa advanced to the semi-finals with a grinding 26-3 win over Japan, bringing an end to the home team's entertaining run at the first Rugby World Cup staged in Asia.

The Springboks have not featured in a World Cup final since 2007 and, until then, their sole appearance at the culmination of rugby's showpiece event was in 1995, their first tournament victory. Only Wales stand in their way of another showdown for the Webb Ellis trophy.

But what do Rassie Erasmus' men need to do to emulate their previous two triumphs? And what, if anything, is hampering their challenge...

The...
description: South Africa advanced to the semi-finals with a grinding 26-3 win over Japan, bringing an end to the home team's entertaining run at the first Rugby World Cup staged in Asia.
